readable.title: 467858872_f3431df682
readable.content: Two dogs are bending over and looking down into a ditch to investigate . Two dogs are digging under a large rock with their bottoms to the camera . Two dogs are shown with only their tails and backsides as they dig in the dirt . Two dogs are sniffing at the ground with their tails in the air . Two dogs with their heads down a hole and their tails are sticking straight up .
